comments:
A NPE may happen in DevClassPathHelper#load(URL) if an IOException is thrown
when calling URL#openStream(). The finally block tries to close the stream
without checking first whether the stream was appropriately obtained. The effect
is that if an IOException occurs while opening the stream, the NPE will hide it.

Core owns 4 copies of this code (one in PDE/Build). Help has another. They all
have the same problem.

The stack trace fragment, for completeness.

java.lang.NullPointerException
  at
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.defaultadaptor.DevClassPathHelper.load(DevClassPathHelper.java:96)
  at
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.defaultadaptor.DevClassPathHelper.<clinit>(DevClassPathHelper.java:31)
Opened bug 93790 against Help, bug 93792 against PDE/Build.
